Basicly how i felt over the last couple of weeks, summed up into a Sugarcult song, I LOVE YOU GEMMA! 

"Memory"


This may never start.
We could fall apart.
And I'd be your memory.
Lost your sense of fear. 
Feelings insincere.
Can I be your memory?

So get back, back, back to where we lasted.
Just like I imagine.
I could never feel this way.
So get back, back, back to the disaster.
My heart's beating faster.
Holding on to feel the same.

This may never start.
I'll tear us apart.
Cannot be your enemy.
Losing half a year.
Waiting for you here
I'd be your anything.

There once was a great fearless leadr named Kudo Mojoho. His father, the king and ruler of Liliphunto was sick and on his death bed. Liliphunto was a moderate sized kingdom, and very wealthy. The markets were some of the best in the land and people traveled from afar just to come and get their food. 
      When Kudo's father died he was entitled to everything. He tought this was a quite larg resposibility. He sat in what was once his fathers chair and took on the task of being the king of the wealthiest kingdoms in the land. To be continued.......

I wish i hadent fucked up so bad. then i would be happy and so would the others involved. i wish i could fix it like you can fix a bike, just find that broken heart, take it out and replace it with a new one. if only it were that easy. My heart is broken and will not fly. I wish things hadn't changed. oh how i wish........

I was looking through my shit while cleaning and i came across this letter that i wrote on the 2nd of february 2003. It was a letter to my wx girlfriend Chelsea, whom was the first love of my life. This brought me to tears, because since her, i have not had a relationship that i didnt FUCK UP! Here's the letter that brought me to tears.

     Dear Chelsea,
            I'm sorry for not calling you, but time has passed us by, and i have thought things through. Knowing these things, i am still in love with you.
I am sorry for not writing you but i have been confused. i will always love you and i have been true. For now lets keep it friends and cherish what we have, and maybe in the future we will once again walk the snowy beaches, Taste that tender kiss and think of what we miss. So till then it will seem like forever, but the wait will be worth it.

               ~Eric       

~Coz i am the man who will fight for your honor. ill be the hero that you're dreaming of... gonna live forever knowing together that we did it all for the glory of love.......

     I just wish i knew when the wait will end. I'm lost and i need to learn to love someone right and respect others feelings.... well more later when i find more writings

Ill be blunt, i am pissed! im like out of it and have been thinking about a lot of things, most not important but relevant to my current status in life..... i dont really know where i want to go in my life. so ill just end this entrie. ill se you all later

Slice open my arms and cut out my heart since now i cannot hold, or love you. Release me from this masque of lies and fake smiles. After tonite, this mask is forever useless, and only a way to hide from the world. When will we finaly move on, not end up like them. Whether it is a preist, or your own fucking silence, my confession to god is as good as his. I have hidden things from myself for far to long, and i will now admit that i was wrong.

Recently I've been comming across the fact that I dont know who I am anymore. I have really let myself go, done things the real Eric wouldn't have and passed up things i wish i had done. Many of which i wish i could undo. The following are some of them...

"I wish I had'nt/was'nt"
Didn't smoke
overweight
weak
caused pain
broken hearts
broken peoples trust in me
made so many mistakes

"I wish I had/would have"
Tried harder
learned my lessons
taken my time
been faithfull in life
cared more

There are a lot more things i wish i did or did not do. These are some of the major ones. I want to change things, but i have dug myself a hole so deep that i can bairly see the light of day, and my only chance to get out is to dig deeper to find out who i really am, then slowly dig my way back to the surface. Then maybe my life will make sense and i will be usefull again.

Recently there has been a lot going through my mind, and a lot going on in the world around me. I fucked up and i know it, i just wish everything would sum up. I also wish i understood myself. I have done a lot that i wish i hadent later. My life is surrounded by regret and what if. i need to get through all of this. i need someone here.....
